resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106065</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106065</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nobel Women</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobel Frauen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes Nobel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres De Nobel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne Nobel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες Νόμπελ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres Nobel</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will focus on women in science, specifically as reflected in the Nobel Prize. This activity will be followed by a discussion of the changing role of women in science (and leadership) throughout the century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion konzentriert auf Frauen in der 
Wissenschaft, spezifisch wie im Nobelpreise reflektiert. Diese 
Aktivität wird von einer Diskussion über die ändernde Rolle der 
Frauen in der Wissenschaft (und in der Führung) während des 
Jahrhunderts gefolgt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon se concentrera sur des femmes en 
science, spécifiquement comme reflété dans le prix Nobel. 
Cette activité sera suivie d'une discussion du rôle changeant 
des femmes dans la science (et la conduite) tout au long du siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição focalizará em mulheres na ciência, 
especificamente como refletido no prêmio de nobel. Esta 
atividade será seguida por uma discussão do papel em mudança das 
mulheres na ciência (e na liderança) durante todo o século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione metterà a fuoco sulle donne nella 
scienza, specificamente come riflesso nel premio Nobel. Questa 
attività sarà seguita da una discussione sul ruolo cambiante delle 
donne nella scienza (e nella direzione) durante il secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα εστιάσει στις γυναίκες στην 
επιστήμη, συγκεκριμένα όπως απεικονίζεται στο βραβείο Νόμπελ. 
Αυτή η δραστηριότητα θα ακολουθηθεί από μια συζήτηση του 
μεταβαλλόμενου ρόλου των γυναικών στην επιστήμη (και την ηγεσία) 
καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια του αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se centrará en mujeres en ciencia, 
específicamente según lo reflejado en el premio Nobel. Esta 
actividad será seguida por una discusión del papel que cambia de 
mujeres en ciencia (y la dirección) a través del siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
